policies.involuntary_refund:
REASONS FOR REFUNDS VIA BSPLINK OR WITH WAIVER:
Involuntary refunds
- Flight cancellation / schedule change more than 3 hours
- Duplicate etkt / new etkt bought
- Death of passenger
- Authorised full refunds for APG Accredited Agents

Note:
For any Refund Application (RA) through BSP Link, or request of waiver when BSPLink is not available, please attach all documents required to avoid any unnecessary rejections:

**CANCELLATION / SCHEDULE CHANGE / STRIKE / WEATHER**
- Copy of full PNR history with UN status.

**DUPLICATE ETKT / NEW ETKT BOUGHT**
- Copy of the ticket issued by mistake (same fare, routing, dates, name) + copy of the valid new ticket. Wrong ticket refunded with EUR 20 fee.

**DEATH OF PASSENGER**
- Copy of PNR history, death certificate, and proof of family ties.

**EXCHANGED ETKT**
- Fill last issued etkt in “document for refund”, first issued etkt in “original issue details”, and others in “reason for refund”. Uncollected change fees will be deducted.

**BSP LINK RA BOXES**
- “Reason for refund” must be filled in ENGLISH with all details.
- “Document for refund” must include correct etkt details.
- “Amount” must match etkt.
- “Original issue details” only if exchange exists.
- “Form of payment” must match original ticket.

Refund applications must be filed before ticket validity ends.
RA will be rejected if incomplete or incorrect.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Voluntary refunds:
- Handle in GDS and submit Refund Application (RA) via BSP Link, or request waiver code where applicable.

GENERAL:
- Unused tickets: refundable if not older than 1 year from issue.
- Partially used: refundable if not older than 1 year from first coupon.

Notes:
- APG Airlines refund service is free, but GDS automatic refunds of involuntary cases may be penalized as per ADM Policy.
- For tickets with multiple carriers/fare bases, most restrictive applies.

REASONS FOR REFUNDS VIA GDS:
- Voluntary cancellations by passenger (operating airline fare rules apply).

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
